title: Cross-post: The Cannabis Investing Podcast With David Sandelman On Curing And Drying Cannabis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: In place of a Labor Day Wall Street Breakfast, we share an episode from Seeking Alpha's Cannabis Investing Podcast featuring David Sandelman, Chief Engineer at Cannatrol, a precision drying/curing system for cannabis. David joined host Rena Sherbill to discuss the similarities between drying and curing meat, cheese and cannabis. They also discuss the sector's resistance to new technology and how his invention helps control humidity in the flower.     Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

They also discuss the sector's resistance to new technology and how his invention helps control humidity in the flower.     Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:summary:
In place of a Labor Day Wall Street Breakfast, we share an episode from Seeking Alpha's Cannabis Investing Podcast featuring David Sandelman, Chief Engineer at Cannatrol, a precision drying/curing system for cannabis. David joined host Rena Sherbill to discuss the similarities between drying and curing meat, cheese and cannabis. They also discuss the sector's resistance to new technology and how his invention helps control humidity in the flower.      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
